body: Recent versions of Elpa fail to install in the configure phase, complaining that sse3, avx, and avx2 are not available even on machines where those instructions are available. This PR sets Elpa to prefer 2016.05.004 until these issues are resolved in future updates to Elpa. @becker33
title: elpa: prefer 2016.05.004 until sse/avx/avx2 configure phase issues ar…
